original_title: La collection Cousteau N°21-1 - Un Allié récalcitrant : Le Mississippi - 1re partie
overview: Cousteau becomes a modern-day Huckleberry Finn to explore the Father of Waters. Shows the Mississippi's icy origin in Minnesota to its destination in the Gulf of Mexico. Looks at the river's land, wildlife, people, folklore, and industry.
title: The Mississippi - Reluctant Ally
